statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; dir_name="$(basename "$current_dir")"; model="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1 && git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_info=" on ó°Š¢ $branch"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "%s%s [%s]" "$dir_name" "$git_info" "$model"
